website_summaries.verdict: The Reebok Princess Lite is recommended for people who are looking for an everyday shoe that’s lighter than typical sneakers. Its mix of materials makes it a comfortable shoe. However, if a potential buyer previously owned an older version of the shoe, it will not be the shoe that they expect it to be.
pros: The Reebok Princess Lite features a 3D Ultralite midsole which provides lightweight shock absorption
The one-piece combination of midsole and outsole gives traction and lightweight flexibility
The low-top style of the shoe promotes ankle mobility
These kicks are made comfy by the Memory Tech sockliner
Many users found the Princess Lite to be comfortable
This is also offered in wide width
cons: A considerable number of users were disappointed that the quality and comfort of the shoe are not similar to the original shoe released in the 80s
A couple of Reebok Princess Lite owners noticed that the material is not breathable
It lacks support as compared with the original, a reviewer has observed
A handful of wearers said that some parts of the shoe are stiff

customer_reviews.title: Stiff and plastic feeling
customer_reviews.text: What a disappointment!!! My favorite shoe for many years turned into something I don't recognize--- the box it came in fits and feels better than the shoe. They are stiff and plastic feeling and I am going to donate them to someone who will get them for free, as I would feel guilty if someone paid even $1 for them . Don't understand the good reviews. All my previous princess sneakers reeboks were so glove leather soft :(
customer_reviews.author: George Bower

customer_reviews.title: Love New Princess
customer_reviews.text: I’ve worn Princess Reebok since they were invented. A few years ago I stopped wearing them because they were not made of leather anymore. I tried many different types of shoes but could not find any as comfortable as the old Princess. These New Princess shoes are made of a leather substitute which is soft and durable. They have memory foam inserts. The soles are flexible. The shoe is lite. I love these as much as the old originals.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable Value
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned when I got these because they are SO lightweight. How could these little wispy sneakers keep my high arches comfortable all day long? I don't know what sorcery is involved, but I wore these to do tourism all over Italy and walked 10+ miles per day without foot pain. I still took away 1 star because they have a cheap vibe, but the styling is right and I really can't complain about the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Nokta

customer_reviews.title: SOOOO COMFY.....
customer_reviews.text: The first pair that got sent to me had stained bottoms as if they were worn, sent back, then cleaned. I contacted them and another pair got sent to me with clean snow white bottoms 2 days later, then I sent the other pair back a few days after recieving the new pair and everything went fine during the process. Very comfortable shoes, stays white for a long time, EXTREMELY comfortable and soft. Material doesn't seem too cheap but it's not real leather I believe. It still holds up 2 months later and doesn't make my feet feel sweaty after long wear. (I wear them every day and hasn't been cleaned yet.)
customer_reviews.author: Sheena P.

customer_reviews.title: ... Princess Lite with the memory foam and it is like walking on marshmellows
customer_reviews.text: I tried the Princess Lite with the memory foam and it is like walking on marshmellows! I used to wear the Princess Reeboks for my aerobic classes and I loved those... they were good but these are GREAT! They are truly "feet friendly" :) Don't forget to get a half size up for sneakers....like boots.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara M.

customer_reviews.title: As expected
customer_reviews.text: Wearing these many years.... used to be leather....now stiff-feeling fake leather. Easy to clean. Do have new insole.... a soft supportive foam. Doesn't quite go fully side to side. Thought that might be a problem but it is not. Actually feel quite supportive especially in heel. The one thing I have always liked they so not have deep grooves in tread...do not carry in dirt....yet still good enough traction on snow...i wearr in light snow instead of boots. One star off for stiffness.
customer_reviews.author: PookaLover

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I needed all white comfortable shoes for clinicals and couldn't find them anywhere. These seem like they'll do the job. Honestly, one shoe seems to be a tad larger than the other even though they're the same size, but it's not a huge deal. I am a size 11 so that's what I ordered and still have some room, so they do run a little bigger.
customer_reviews.author: jamie

customer_reviews.title: Cut out and top narrow , black
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these I was very hopeful as I have these in in white and they are good. But when I opened the box I saw a small white area, Where the synthetic "leather" was cut out or cut or damaged. Still I was hopeful. But then tried them on. They were way too narrow in the toe area. Disappointed,I decided to try them again later when I would be sure my feet had not possibly swelled. Tried them days later, and they were still too narrow. I ordered Wide. These were definitely not wide. It is a pity, but I had to return them.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Fleur

customer_reviews.title: "lite" is not good
customer_reviews.text: I compared this "lite" Princess sneaker to my 3-4 year old Reebok Princess black classic sneaker that I still wear. The lite weighs noticeably less than the classic, is not as substantial. There is less lining/padding inside the sneaker than the classic. The sole is thinner. When I tried lite on, there was minimal support. I didn't even bother to take the other sneaker out of the box. Sent them back, and will try out a new pair of regular Reeboks instead.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl J. Tyrell

customer_reviews.title: I did not care that it was imported.  in the future I will buy locally
customer_reviews.text: The Reeboks looked as if they were made with inferior products. The Princess that I have worn for years have a high arch that I need. These shoes from Vietnam had no arch at all. I do have orthotic arches that I will be using in this shoe. They are just an inferior shoe and I would not want to wear them in the public. They look cheap. I take responsibility for not reading before I ordered that they were imported and will not return them since it will take lots of activity to do so. And paying the postage is out of the question.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B Crew

customer_reviews.title: Done with Reebok
customer_reviews.text: Will not order from Reebok again. Very bad construction and manufacturing. With a 1hr wear time in my house the glue was pulling away, the 'leather like' upper began to show cracking and wrinkling, and the fit was impossibly large. Should have returned right away but now the return date has passed. My mistake. Gave them to a charity last week. Worn this brand for decades. Will not be supporting this company any longer.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I like these shoes very much.  I feel they are more narrow then my previous purchases of Princess shoes by Reebok.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's and I have always purchased the Reebok Women's Princess shoes. Recently, however, we were talking about how they seem to be making these shoes more narrow than before. Now that was a universal feeling between my 3 daughters and myself. I love the shoes. They always make me feel good except now as the day wears on they do feel tighter. I have NO swelling in my feet so I rule that out.
customer_reviews.author: Mary R. Kolk

customer_reviews.title: SAVE UR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: The wife has been getting this same shoe for last 25 years an they haven't changed in all that time ! But these that I order for here are not right... too big, no arch, think there plastic not leather, trade mark missing on one.. Would of sent back but wife really needed shoes... She wore them for two days an they went in the trash !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: I know these shoes were not that much money but ohhhmyyyygoodnnesss do they look like they are made out of cardboard. They look so ridiculously cheap and they just HAVE to be fake. I get the phrase "You get what you pay for" but when considering they have the Reebok logo on them, it's a shame this operation has not been shut down. I was disappointed and returned the pair. I do not suggest you buy these. Instead, invest an extra few bucks in a pair of shoes that seem like they can last longer than a trip to the mailbox (or the UPS store-- where I returned!)
customer_reviews.author: Viktoria

customer_reviews.title: This is NOT the Reebok Princess I have always loved.
customer_reviews.text: I only ordered a pair because my old ones were wearing out pretty bad. When I received these, they had a wider rubber sole and just didn't look right. The reason I loved my original Princess Reebok because they were made of leather, and the inside was cotton terry cloth. The new ones are not leather and not terry cloth and are uncomfortable. I will return them. Love love love the OLD PRINCESS REEBOK.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are very comfortable, but the arch support isn't as good as ...
customer_reviews.text: I've never tried to wear these shoes all day, but I suspect I could. They are very comfortable, but the arch support isn't as good as it was in my really old Princess shoes. I normally need a narrow width in shoes, but these fit perfectly in an average width. Perhaps they would be too narrow for some??
customer_reviews.author: JELD

customer_reviews.title: Poorly maid
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this shoe sense the 80s and never felt such a horrible shoe. This can not be a Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: ji

customer_reviews.title: Marshmallow Puffs
customer_reviews.text: I have a very slim (AAA) foot. I can wear these shoes in an M width. As my slim-footed sisters can attest, it's not unusual to have to pay at least twice this much for something that fits us. By all means DO go AT LEAST a half-size up. I'd recommend a FULL size up for individuals with "medium" width feet. There's been much wailing over the years about the manufacturer's move from leather to "pleather", but it doesn't bother me. They wipe clean with a damp rag.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Area

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware - Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 pairs of over these over the years but will never buy them again. The sole is composite foam rubber, lightweight, and I suspect will not last. Made more cost-effectively with the use of lower quality material. The design isn't what it used to be either. Not want I have come to expect from Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: Christine L.

customer_reviews.title: These shoes run a size larger than indicated.
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying Reeboks for over the last 30 years. Always the white, and either a 6.5 wide or a size 7. I put these on today - they are an inch longer than the ones I have on. I am returning them forthwith. Also, it is the first time since being an Amazon customer that I have had to return something. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Anne4515443

customer_reviews.title: Knock-offs!!
customer_reviews.text: I would give no stars if that was an option. I picked these up to replace my old pair of this same style and they suck. They are too narrow. They are too stiff. The sole is not real rubber. The memory foam is too thin and not contoured like my old ones. And, they do not have the proper Reebok tag on the underside of the shoe's tongue. The size sticker should be on the inside of the out side of the shoe as well. Instead, they are under the tongue. They are total knock offs!!! Buyers should beware. If you love your feet and have a modicum of self respect, you will NOT buy these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Tizzy-Licious

customer_reviews.title: Shoes are fine except for one thing.
customer_reviews.text: The shoes are OK, but I deducted 2 stars because as you can see by the picture, the front bumper on the right shoe is quite a bit larger than the one on the left shoe. we noticed that as soon as we took them out of the box, but I didn't want to send them back. I'll just wear these around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Russell L. Dillingham

customer_reviews.title: Cheesy made! It's horrible
customer_reviews.text: This must be certainly a fake. From the nice and super cozy reebok that I have worn more than one decade when I was growing up this is certainly a fake... or reebok has totally lost the quality. It almost feel like steeping on cardboard. Highly disappointed :(
customer_reviews.author: Vet Mom

customer_reviews.title: Too flat. Runs small. Not like they used to be.
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared. These are not quality shoes and in my opinion, quite different from the past. They do not look right and are very flat looking. Worst part is that you will have to pay for shipping to return these. Even though these were ordered with Amazon Prime they are not a free return. I am definitely not a happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: A. Berryann

customer_reviews.title: Love This Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have learned to go a half size up and wide for a good, comfortable fit. I usually wear an 8.5 regular in a dress shoe. I bought a 9W in this Reebok, and they fit great. I am really enjoying using them for a walking shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer

customer_reviews.title: For Narrow Feet, go for the Classic, not Lite Classic
customer_reviews.text: The Princess Classic has been my go-to sneaker for years. I have narrow feet, and they fit beautifully. This time, I accidentally ordered the Lite Classic. The insole is nice a cushy, and feels great, but the toe of the shoe is wider than the Classic. Not terrible, but the shoe has a looser, less comfortable overall fit for me. Again, not terrible, but next time, I'll be sure to order the regular Classic.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn B

customer_reviews.title: Quality declining.
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed in this item because the quality is not what I have come to expect from Reebok. I have been wearing the Reebok Princess Classic shoe for more than thirty years and this is the first time that I have had issues with my feet sweating. Maybe the lite is different from what I usually buy but they look the same. The previous two pairs of Reeboks did not last as long as former ones. The soles came loose at the toe on both pairs. I am planning to shop for a new brand when these need to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: BKLover

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Been buying Reebok for years, the same shoe style. I use a 9 Wide. These shoes look like duck shoes, VERY unflattering. Switching brands, quality has gone way down of the brand. They did fit though as a true 9.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent shoes, ultra light weight and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are super comfortable immediately out of the box. High quality and incredibly light. I walked an entire theme park day right after getting them and had a great experience. And one of the few shoe styles that fits into the very limiting rules for my workplace uniforms. Love love love. Will definitely repurchase when the time comes.
customer_reviews.author: ACLEVERDAME

customer_reviews.title: Order half size up
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear size 6 1/2, but based on the other reviews, I ordered 1/2 size up, which was a great decision to make. They fit comfortably and I can wear them all day as long as I’m not moving around a lot. The materials make it unbreathable, so it tend to keep the moisture. I don’t wear them if I’m expected to walk around a lot. They are light weight and the simple design make them stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Lana

customer_reviews.title: Sizes aren't correct.
customer_reviews.text: I'm so disappointed! I'd been wearing size 8 Reebok shoes for decades. However, through this site and others, I've now ordered (and returned) size 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, and 10 and NONE of them fit! They were ALL too small. I HATED having to buy a different brand, but I just got tired of returning them. I hope Reebok gets their sizing right at some point in the future because they used to be great shoes!
customer_reviews.author: Allegra

customer_reviews.title: Extraordinarily narrow
customer_reviews.text: Extraordinarily narrow, and I have a narrow foot. I ordered a wide, but it cut off the circulation in the ball of my foot. I returned both pair.
customer_reviews.author: S. Carlson

customer_reviews.title: HELP WITH STABILITY and COMFORT
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased several pairs of other quality shoes for comfort. Although I've worn them before, my issue is now stability and walking pain-free. I needed something that didn't have much of a platform wedge but was still supportive, as well as something that could pass as a little dressier shoe. These provide this for me. I feel more sure footed in these and can walk a few hours before my feet begin hurting.
customer_reviews.author: The Dancing Chef

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable & very stylish
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for comfortable yet trendy shoes to wear and this totally fits the bill! Exactly true to size for my wide preference and the memory foam inside makes it feel like you're walking on air. It's very comfortable and goes with everything I wear. Highly recommend for shoes that are comfortable and look great with any outfit.
customer_reviews.author: Tayyaba

customer_reviews.title: They’re just not right
customer_reviews.text: The rubber edge around the front is extremely thick and bulky. They don’t look like any of the Princess Lite Reeboks I’ve had in the past. I’m not sure if these are a knock off or if the pair I received were just manufactured incorrectly. They’re not completely hideous but they are definitely quite wonky. All around just not what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: These are nothing like the original Reebok Princess shoes
customer_reviews.text: I hated these shoes and refuse to wear them even once. They are not shaped at the toes anything like the original Princess shoe and were uncomfortable immediately upon putting them on. I will never order these again and truly regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: They are really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: They are really comfortable. Weren't exactly the ones I wanted, but I didn't realize they were different.. but I really like them and my boyfriend likes these better than the ones I like. The ones I like are more narrow for my skinny feet.. these are not narrow, but not really wide either. They're perfect and roomy. thank you.
customer_reviews.author: kim v.

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Women's Princess Lit Classic Shoe  Black  size 6.5 W
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are larger than the Reebok Princess Sneaker White size 6.5 W meaning fit as expected. The sole of the "Lit Classic" is different though and doesn't appeal to my liking. I prefer the look of the Princess "Sneaker" and the fit of the "Lit Classic". Overall they feel great and were delivered in seven days with free shipping after placing my order. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: cjsdemaria

customer_reviews.title: Cute, comfy and sturdy!!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to wear at work and they work quite well for that. They are really comfortable to wear 8 hours on my feet every day. I am rough on shoes at work and they hold up really well. Ive had them about 6 month now and they are still in great condition!!
customer_reviews.author: Coral Shell

customer_reviews.title: Reebok’s are good shoes !!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were too flat for my feet , not enough arch support !! They’re good shoes but not for me anymore !! My feet have changed since I last wore Reebok’s several years ago !! Thank you !!
customer_reviews.author: Faye F Dillon

customer_reviews.title: I got these as a birthday gift for my 81 ...
customer_reviews.text: I got these as a birthday gift for my 81 year old mother. She has one these shoes most of her life and now she has early Alzheimer's. But she still loves these tennis shoes. Thank you for bringing some familiarity to my mother and comfort to me seeing her smile again
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Old name, new style/design
customer_reviews.text: I have worn this model of REEBOK for years, but this pair is slightly different in fit and actual design, not bad just different. The older ones have a glued on thin sole that has the tread. The new one has the sole as one piece, not separate or glued on the bottom. This one also feels different than my older shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Gohata

customer_reviews.title: Great sneak at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Not only do I have a wide foot, but I also have funky bent toes. Getting a half size larger solved the problem of comfort for all these problems. Because of hip replacement and bilateral knee replacement, it is necessary to have a lift added to one shoe. The local shoe repairman was able to do the lift with no problem in the shoe.
customer_reviews.author: JEM

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Have owned Reeboks for years and have loved the look and fit...these were only different in the quality of the materials as they were much flimsier than all I have owned in the past. I will forever love the look and the fit is always true to size they just had less support and much lighter than previous purchases.
customer_reviews.author: shopperj

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding these, I have worn these for years for work where I am on my feet all the time. Glad you had them will be easy to replace now.
customer_reviews.author: Everett Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Not what they used to be
customer_reviews.text: These are not made as well as they used to be. I have worn this same style for almost 30 years. The "leather" started breaking down after a couple of weeks. The arch support, which us why I buy them, was almost nonexistent in this pair. This pair was even wider than the last I bought. The shoe laces are so long that I could lace them around my leg to my calf. I'm looking for another brand to become my favorite shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 2nd Pair
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair I've bought. I work 10 hour shifts mostly walking on concrete floors. I've had shoes that feel a little better and support my arches a bit more, but they've always cost over twice as much as these. This pair does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Suzy

customer_reviews.title: I guess I’ll look someplace else...
customer_reviews.text: So I originally bought a size 8.5 that looked fine but ran small and decided to exchange them for a size up. I get the new ones and the toes are shaped completely different. One is snubbed and the other is nicely curved like I was expecting. They’re comfortable but cheap feeling and an eyesore, I’m going to return them. They just aren’t worth $38. Really good customer service though!
customer_reviews.author: Sam Prescott

customer_reviews.title: I am suspicious of these shoes. I question their authenticity 😕
customer_reviews.text: There is something very strange about these shoes. I feel like they could be counterfeit Reeboks. I have had a look at the stitching on the shoes I received and photos of others of the same style being sold. There are many differences. These shoes are not a patch on the other Reeboks I own. They look and feel cheap and nasty!
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn

customer_reviews.title: Retro & still stylish
customer_reviews.text: Bought as Cheer-leading shoes for my daughter that has wide feet and dislikes the feel of K-Swiss on her feet. Pros: Lightweight, Comfortable, Attractive, Washable. Cons: Since they are white they can get dirty easily (of course!). I am very happy with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: COMFORTABLE THE FIRST DAY!
customer_reviews.text: My old standby most comfortable pair of shoes just got even more comfortable!!! I was a little worried when I first got them because of the memory foam insole - I was afraid they would be too small with the extra padding. But they compensated for the extra room taken by the padding. This is the first pair of shoes I have ever worn that was comfortable THE FIRST DAY!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda G. Hoeck

customer_reviews.title: Buy it sis and thank me later!
customer_reviews.text: Very light weight. Extremely comfortable with these memory foam insoles. Neat. I'm in love........ I wore the left foot while my husband was checking out the right foot and there I was asking my husband for the left foot of shoe dwl. Thanks seller. I will be ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Lavern Anderson Gordon

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered my size (6W) and was disappointed that they were so tight in the toe area. The toe box is much too narrow to be called wide and my toes almost touched the front of the shoe. I tried them on wearing somewhat thin cotton socks, which I do with all sneakers, so I knew they would definitely not be good for winter and heavier socks. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: Rosie

customer_reviews.title: Poor & Cheap
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are so cheaply and poorly made. Nothing like the Ones in the store, they feel so flimsy and the front is already separating. They’re going back
customer_reviews.author: Arezouuuu95

customer_reviews.title: Still great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: I have bought these sneakers before. I still had the box and I bought them. Unfortunately the previous size was 6 1/2 wide. But that was at least 10 yrs ago so I bought them 7 wide. They are kind of big. But still the great sneakers of before. Would keep on buying them.
customer_reviews.author: littlewoman953

customer_reviews.title: Not my faithful shoe
customer_reviews.text: They feel very nice at first, but the high tech cushion goes flat fast. I wore the classic princess shoe for 30-ish years. This is NOT a suitable replacement. I want my old shoes back! I am back to add more to this story. Not only are these NOT the same shoe, they actually caused painful injury!!!! I am now seeing a specialist for plantar fasciitis- caused by these shoes! Reebok, I hope you are listening, because this was a devastating change and you have lost a life long customer! There is one star in my rating, but only because at least one is required. I feel that a 0 star rating is more appropriate. Don't buy this shoe!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the product received for the price I paid. I knew the shoes were not genuine leather when I ordered and I am very happy with the quality and fit. They are just as comfortable as the other Reebok Classic shoes that I have worn for years. Free shipping was great and they were received in less than 48 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda Williams

customer_reviews.title: Surprise Fit
customer_reviews.text: The size that fit me was the Princess Classic. The Lite Classic was very comfortable and looks pretty much the same, but just enough to fall off my feet when I walked. The size was 8.5 M.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerNana

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Great fit, very comfortable. Slight quality control issue with rubber on left shoe toe, it's a little larger than the right toe. The problem is not enough for me to return. I am happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Colleen K.

customer_reviews.title: Knock offs
customer_reviews.text: These shoes look and feel terrible very uncomfortable. Wore them to work for a few days and never had so much pain and discomfort they stretch funny not really leather save your money they’re cheaply made and crease incredibly as they are not leather very bad never again if I could give 0 stars I would these are not realReeboks terrible never again
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa

customer_reviews.title: Not for those with sweaty feet
customer_reviews.text: I'd be lying if I said this shoe doesn't make my feet sweat. It's not made of leather. It's 100 percent plastic so expect some perspiration because it doesn't breath much. I still have it all the stars because it's comfortable as hell and I'm on my feet all day so I need comfortable shoes.
customer_reviews.author: MD

customer_reviews.title: toes are tight
customer_reviews.text: toes are a little tight, never had that problem in the past with Reebok. Wore them a few days and they stretched, but I'm disappointed that I had to stretch them because usually I buy them and they fit perfect right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Mom2JandJ

customer_reviews.title: and I really don't like them. They are very light weight from any ...
customer_reviews.text: The sole on the right foot in the front of the shoe is about double the size it is suppose to be, looks weird. I didn't look at them right away, and I really don't like them. They are very light weight from any other pair I have ever had and I have had a lot of them. I am 63 and I have worn them since I can remember. I feel like they are knockoffs. I could be wrong. My husband got rid of the box so I guess I am stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: katie parrott

customer_reviews.title: TRASH PLASTIC SHOE!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this style years ago. This is NOTHING like Reebok Princess. This is a CHEAP PLASTIC shoe with no arch support!!!!! Trash made in Vietnam!!!! Shame on Reebok!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Extremely comfortable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable!!!The last Reebock shoe I've been wearing for twelve years and is just starting to wear out,so,I needed a new pair.Love these shoes!!!I walk two miles a day on concrete and these shoes are great!!!Will continue to buy them !!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carol Koffel

customer_reviews.title: I am a very disatisfied customer..i need the item i ordered and not this mismatch pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: I did not get what i ordered online..instead i got 2 different types in the pair. .it looks ridiculous as u can see in the picture..i feel so disappointed with my purchase...one of the front toe lining of the shoes is puffier and bigger than the next foot..i dnt kno what to do with it as i will never b able to wear this mismatch pair of sneakers..if i could give 0 star i would..😭😢..
customer_reviews.author: Unique1

customer_reviews.title: Cheaper on Amazon than in stores
customer_reviews.text: These are the only shoes my mother will wear and she regularly pays close to $50 them. I searched online and found these and they are perfect. Delivered right to her door for almost half the price she pays in the shoe stores WHEN she can find them. She is very happy and says her feet don't hurt her anymore at work.
customer_reviews.author: Kasjar

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: These shoes had absolutely no support. I was hoping to wear them to work in assisted living but they were so uncomfortable that I could barely wear them on a short walk with the dog. My feet were killing me after 15 minutes.
customer_reviews.author: jennerator

customer_reviews.title: IMITATION PRINCESS REEBOKS IN MY OPINION
customer_reviews.text: I have been purchasing Reebok Princess for years. This product does not stand up to the quality of the original Princess classic. These shoes you sent are all imitation leather. The original WAS all leather uppers. They stretched where necessary and allowed my foot to breathe. I am sorry you choose to sell this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Not a great fit
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice light sneaker but they bother my toes if I wear them all day. A little snug in the toe (with) & and I dont need wide shoes. I got 8 1/2 my size. I know I cant wear a 9. So I need to wear a light sock or the toe with is squishy Like rubbing on the sides of my toes.
customer_reviews.author: Mary VanTine

customer_reviews.title: love these shoes this is my 4th pair
customer_reviews.text: these shoes not only feel good but look good on. I have washed them in the washing machine on gentle cold water and they look good for longer. I would suggest getting the wide width if you wear a heavy sock
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not for nurses
customer_reviews.text: Not comfortable for nursing students who stand on their feet all day. Nah pay the extra money and get a better quality shoe
customer_reviews.author: C Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Great prices but there knockoffs
customer_reviews.text: I like that the classic reebox shoes aren't that expensive! But one side of the sole is way thicker so basically who ever picked these out to send out didn't take the time to make sure they BOTH LOOK THE SAME but you get what you pay for for knockoffs
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Carter-Kahal

customer_reviews.title: Good Everday Shoe
customer_reviews.text: I've worn these for years...They are a very comfortable shoe...Feet aren't bothered wearing them all day..pretty good support too...The look nice... Got a black pair for winter time..white for other time of the year....Fit is very good...
customer_reviews.author: sooer 37

customer_reviews.title: Look and feel cheap
customer_reviews.text: I had to return these sneakers. They appeared to be counterfeit. I could be wrong but they were not comfy and looked cheap. The size was off too. They were too big for my size 8.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This shoe feel hollow and empty. When the box arrived I thought it was empty. I really should have returned the product, but gave it to a charity. Never even worn once.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea J Ross

customer_reviews.title: What happened to the arches?
customer_reviews.text: I have worn reeboks since the 80s and they always had nice arches, now none. Why is that? I did read the reviews so I knew these were not leather anymore and that is a shame. Leather is so much better. I don't understand why companies take something that works and change it. I am going to have to shop around to find a shoe that really works for me which is something I hate doing!
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn R. Butz

customer_reviews.title: I'm a little concerned
customer_reviews.text: Why are these shoes more expensive than the other shoes? Am I paying extra for the color? Well things change sometimes. I still love the shoes and eventually I will have them in every color.
customer_reviews.author: jdub57

customer_reviews.title: Not as i wanted
customer_reviews.text: Apparently there is a big difference between the reebok classic and the classic lite, really didnt like the sole of the lite pair, returned them and will be ordering the regular reebok classic
customer_reviews.author: holly1054

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for my 90 y/o mother.
customer_reviews.text: Wife has worn these Reebok shoes forever. She loves them. Smaller size, though. My 90 tear old mother is having trouble finding shoes that fit because of toe problems. I've tried several but nothing works. I thought the wide size would help but it didn't. Otherwise, they are a great sneaker according to my wife.
customer_reviews.author: matthew r hunt

customer_reviews.title: Reebok Women's Princess Lite Classic Shoe
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit. So comfortable. Going to buy the white pair in this size for working out at the club and have this be my regular street shoes because they are perfect for walking in.
customer_reviews.author: alaskan-chatterbox

customer_reviews.title: Okay for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my daughter for school and they are nice, however, I wish the quality was a little better. They crease very easily as they are not as sturdy as the other style, but for the price, I guess they are okay. I wouldn't buy them again though.
customer_reviews.author: NY Mom of 4

customer_reviews.title: i dont think they are real Reebok
customer_reviews.text: They do not feel like real leather, they do not have the soft spongy bottom, the bottoms are slick and not the Reebok...Back in the 80's when your parents cheaped out and bought the knock off reeboks they was still better than these...Not cool for what i paid for them and thought i was getting...
customer_reviews.author: Rhiannon Tupper

customer_reviews.title: Heaven sent
customer_reviews.text: I been wearing Reebok Princess snickers. Since the 90's, when i was in Clinicals for Nursing. The lite weight feels like i am wear bedroom slippers. Also, can tell the difference in my feet. They don't hurt as much. Thank You Jesus!!! I absolutely love these shoe. From now on they will be my go to shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Frierson

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT. SO COMFY.
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, I was a cna and on my feet allllll day and these shoes made me feel less like curling up into a ball and crying at the end of the day. Have lasted through eight months of continuous hard work. Can wipe clean. True to size. These are my new ride or die work shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Bergman

customer_reviews.title: Lite as air
customer_reviews.text: When they say lite, they mean LITE! These shoes are like air on your feet. As a postal carrier they work very well with the rain and 15 miles a day of walking I do. The only thing they don’t have is arch support for those who would need it. Very flat shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Rea

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Good as expected and comfortable, but after a few wears the front takes a weird shape and bend. Not very attractive
customer_reviews.author: D. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Great Shoes
customer_reviews.text: Although these are a bit wide but I decided to keep them so I can wear them with socks. So it has worked out well for me. These are my favorite shoes, I have been wearing them for years and years. I am just happy they are still available.
customer_reviews.author: Loretta

customer_reviews.title: New shoes with a slightly snug fit
customer_reviews.text: They are just a tad bit snug, but I believe that as I wear them, they will stretch out. They are new shoes after all. But other than the slight snug fit. I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Tyler

customer_reviews.title: Like them for Nursing school
customer_reviews.text: I really like these for nursing school and clinicals and everything that comes along with it. They're very light weight which is nice. I was a bit worried about it, because I didnt know if they would hold up? But so far so good!!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Better than I expected
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the review I was unsure if I wanted to try ordering them - but I did and I'm so glad. I got my usual 7.5, but a wider width than I usually wear and with the memory foam insole, these are the most comfortable pair I've ever had. No "breaking in" needed. I am now trying to get them a bit dirty so they don't stand out like spanking new sneakers! for my upcoming trip involving lots of walking. Again thank you Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: N. Kapanka

customer_reviews.title: Great sneaker
customer_reviews.text: Love love these sneakers. Haven’t had a pair in over 20 years. Anything else I tried was too confining, these didn’t fail me. Wanted them in pink but can’t find them anywhere, always sold out.
customer_reviews.author: Elle

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: Shoes are good quality for the price. I noticed they are made in Vietnam zap they run small. I wear a 7, but I should have ordered a 7.5
customer_reviews.author: rusandlynda

customer_reviews.title: Great work shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair. They last a couple of years and are great for work. Very comfortable. Not leather and the shoelaces are a bit long. I have to double knot them or they come untied constantly.
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Not right sizing poor quality material would not recommend to others
customer_reviews.author: Alice Perales

customer_reviews.title: Always Reebok for quality and fit
customer_reviews.text: I always buy Reebok sneakers because they fit so well and are stylish. This is my favorite of all Reebok styles. They are comfortable and then price was reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: Gramms & Gramps144

customer_reviews.title: Great sneakers
customer_reviews.text: Will update in the future I bought these sneakers for my daughter for christmas but I try them on and she is close to my size and they where loose on me so they should fit perfectly on her
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I still like the princess reebok
customer_reviews.text: I still like the princess reebok, it's just a have problems with my feet(surgery on one of them) and the width just didn't fit right--before the problem with my foot, I work these shoes..I'd still say they are a nice shoe to have.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for my office job.
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable right out of the box. But the soles wore out in a few months of wear. Expected better from Reebok.
customer_reviews.author: GetHitchedKwik

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly lightweight, comfortable shoes!
customer_reviews.text: Amazingly lightweight, and the Memorytech cushion inside is SO comfy. I typically wear a 6 wide in most shoes, but I could easily wear a 5 1/2 wide in these Reeboks -- a little long in the length but perfect in the width. Overall, I am pleased with the comfort, the weight, the look, and the quality. I will definitely purchase these shoes again (but half a size smaller).
customer_reviews.author: Shrew

product_meta.title: Reebok Women's Princess Lite Walking Shoe
product_meta.description: Reebok Women's Princess Lite Classic Casual Shoes provide a combination of quality comfort and classic style. A cushioned midsole and outsole keep your feet feeling good, while the tried-and-true silhouette on these women's sneakers deliver sophisticated style.
feature_bullets: DURABLE AND LIGHTWEIGHT MATERIAL: These classic sneakers feature synthetic upper that provides support and comfort with classic style
EFFICIENT FOOT SUPPORT: These stylish trainers with EVA midsole provides support to the feet which lasts many strolls and jogs
STAY COOL AND DRY: This footwear features soft terry lining which absorbs moisture keeping your feet cool and dry

COMFORTABLE AND STURDY DESIGN: This Reebok joggers come with padded foam sockliner that provides lightweight cushioning and low-top from arch offers mobility at the ankles which keeps you moving all day long
HIGH-PERFORMANCE CASUAL SHOES: Rubber outsole provides durability; Ideal to wear for daily activities
